pll class

Bases: object

PLL main class

Adds component instance to PLL components dict

Parameters:

components (object | list[Object]) – Components instances to be added Index is the components name.

Plots the outputs of the PLL

start()[source]¶

Start PLL simulation

Voltage Controlled Oscillator Module¶

VCO Class

class components.vco.Vco(env, name='VCO', clk=False)[source]¶

Bases: Settings

Models a voltage controlled oscilator.

The higher voltage at the input the faster the frequency of the output.
